BuxomMod:NakedRelic.FLAVOR: Your naked body magically slips out of any attempt to cover it.

BuxomMod:DwarfBoobsRelic.NAME: J-Cup Bra
BuxomMod:DwarfBoobsRelic.FLAVOR: Prone to larger breasts than humans, Lehmana's dwarven J-cups are not as noteworthy as you'd think.

BuxomMod:CowRelic.NAME: Stuffed Cow

BuxomMod:MCupRelic.NAME: M-Cup Bra
BuxomMod:MCupRelic.FLAVOR: While controllable to an extent, long-term growth is the inevitable price of using one's breasts as a magic focus.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b1 #yBuxom for every #b4 cards in your Deck, and #b2 #yCapacity for every #b3.

BuxomMod:LotionRelic.NAME: Frenetic Lotion
BuxomMod:LotionRelic.FLAVOR: The breasts conduct magic best when bare, and this lotion excites it even further.

BuxomMod:OmegaThreadRelic.NAME: Omega Thread
